thread.title: Tourism Society appoints new board members
thread.title_full: Tourism Society appoints new board members

title: Tourism Society appoints new board members
text:
Tourism Society appoints new board members 20 July 2015 
The Tourism Society has appointed two new members to its board – Adam Bray and Julian Zarb. 
Bray is senior corporate affairs manager at The Crown Estate and specialises in destination marketing. 
Zarb is a visiting lecturer and doctorate student at the Institute for Travel, Tourism and Culture at the University of Malta, with more than 25 years experience working in the hospitality and tourism sector. 
Fiona Jeffery, founder and chairman of the Just a Drop charity, has stepped down from the Tourism Society’s board.
